dcterms:creator: U-V Marti
Horst Bunke
dcterms:description: The IAM Database consists of images of handwritten English text documents, produced by 657 writers. It includes a training set of 747 documents, a validation set of 116 documents, and a test set of 336 documents, with a total of 6,482 lines and 55,081 words.
dcterms:title: IAM Database
